Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot:



The Neo Decepticon Emperor dive bombed, hitting two birds with one stone.  
The emotionless robot avoided the plasma shot fired at him, and launched off 
two missiles at the Chivtron base.  He pulled up and changed his course, 
heading for Asia and his velocity increasing.

He sent out a comm. to everyone who had fought along with the Neo Cons and 
the Neo Decepticons as well.

"This is Shockwave, we have done sufficient damage here, to continue would be 
a meaningless waste of resources.  Change your courses to the Ramora and 
increase your velocities."



Several shots dug into Unitron's frame, damaging it even worse.  This woke 
him up in time to hear Shockwave's retreat.  He painfully transformed into 
his space fighter mode, launching off towards the Ramora, not even stopping 
to take a few pot shots since he was eager to flee.



Firestarter executed the perfect barrel roll, the fusion blast flying under 
him, the shock wave of the blast lightly shaking Firestarter.  He launched 
off twenty rapid laser blasts at Forrior, changing his heading for Asia.  
"Next time you Autobot wanna bes!"


Two laser blasts and weapons fire form a proton cannon flew past the STAG as 
he performed a few aerial maneuvers, but it left himself open to catch a 
dozen bullets in the underbelly of his mode.  He transformed to his biped 
mode to keep from leaking to much mech-fluid.  He fired off a few optic 
blasts down at Starstomp, heading for Asia as he was ordered.
